request.description:
Template name and description are hard coded as <<hostname>>-<<feature-name>>
hostname and feaure-name will be coming from outer proxy api's input param

Other input params for executing this are: 
"deviceType": 2nd api's response-> data\device-type,
"deviceModels": 2nd api's response-> data\device-model

Along with the above mentioned input params, payload for the feature template should be extracted from outer proxy api's input payload. 
Payload should be created with multiple optional fields for list.

item.name: 2e. To Create VPN Interface Feature Template
To Create VPN Interface Feature Template

request.description:
Template name and description are hard coded as <<hostname>>-<<feature-name>>
hostname and feaure-name will be coming from outer proxy api's input param

Other input params for executing this are: 
"deviceType": 2nd api's response-> data\device-type,
"deviceModels": 2nd api's response-> data\device-model

Along with the above mentioned input params, payload for the feature template should be extracted from outer proxy api's input payload. 
Payload should be created with multiple optional fields for list.

Have used the input payload as of "BT-VIP100-2-VPN-Interface-Ethernet" configuration
